duties_responsibilities.duty: Articulate company's products and value to potential prospects.
Achieve call metrics and meeting goals.
Develop territory strategies to penetrate market.
Leverage existing marketing programs to engage potential prospects.
Share market feedback with Sales Executives.
Consistently track all outreach in Salesforce.

education_certification.credential: 1+ years of corporate work experience, 1+ years of sales experience. Working knowledge of CRM (preferably Salesforce). Mastery of Microsoft Office applications. Awareness of localization industry concepts and practices. Knowledge of additional languages (Spanish) would be seen as an asset.
